topics.body:
ok i finished watching the touhou anime, and i gots to say....i didint expected it to actually be good.

its got a lot of good stuff, crazy maniacs, smug villains, awesome heroes, charismatic and funny characters, an interesting story, and magical bullets BLOWING UP SHIT HERE, AND THERE, AND OVER THERE, everything is blowing up.
